Sol is a main-sequence yellow star of spectral class G2V, and is the most populated star system in all of Juxta Sagittaria. Sol is believed to be approximately 4.5 billion years old.

Sol is orbited by Earth, the capital and homeworld of the Terran Federation. Terrans have a consistent presence throughout the Sol system due to the abundance of lucrative mining sites across Solâ€™s various planets, moons, and asteroids.

Solar system

The Solar system has eight planets: Four inner terrestrial planets, two gas giants, and two ice giants.
